jobDescription: Lead Data Scientist  If you are a Lead Data Scientist with experience, please read on...  With an office in San Francisco, we are an industry-leading analytics tech firm that specializes in cost-effective solutions for the utility sector!!  Currently, we're looking for a Lead Data Analyst who has experience with quantitative analysis and machine learning. This candidate will preferably also have experience with SQL and have experience managing a small team. If this sounds like you then please apply today! What's In It for You
